implements java.lang.Cloneable, IDataEventSource

      • getSiblings

        public java.util.List<Factor> getSiblings()
        Description copied from interface: INode
        Returns an unmodifiable list of sibling nodes attached to this node. This may allocate a new object, so the caller should avoid calling this repeatedly for the same node in a loop.
        Specified by:
        getSiblings in interface INode
        Overrides:
        getSiblings in class Node

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Model-specific initialization for variables.

        Clears isDeterministicInput() and isDeterministicOutput(). Does NOT invoke solver variable initialize.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface INode
        Overrides:
        initialize in class Node

      • getEventMask

        protected int getEventMask()
        Description copied from class: Node
        Return mask of flag bits that are used to determine whether to generate events. This is used by Node.notifyListenerChanged() to clear the specified flag bits. It is assumed that the value of all zeros indicates that the object needs to recompute its flags based on the listener.

        The default implementation returns zero.

        Overrides:
        getEventMask in class Node

      • asDiscreteVariable

        public Discrete asDiscreteVariable()
        Casts this object to a Discrete.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if this is not an instance of Discrete.

public java.lang.Object getInputObject()

      • getSolverIfType

        @Nullable
public <T extends ISolverVariable> T getSolverIfType(java.lang.Class<? extends T> solverVariableClass)
        Returns the solver-specific variable instance associated with this model variable if it is an instance of the specified solverVariableClass, otherwise returns null.

      • getSolverIfTypeAndGraph

        @Nullable
public <T extends ISolverVariable> T getSolverIfTypeAndGraph(java.lang.Class<? extends T> solverVariableClass,
                                                             ISolverFactorGraph solverGraph)
        Returns the solver-specific variable instance associated with this model variable if it is an instance of the specified solverVariableClass and has ISolverNode.getParentGraph() equal to solverGraph, otherwise returns null.

      • isDeterministicInput

        public final boolean isDeterministicInput()
        True if variable is an input to a directed deterministic function.

        This attribute is not valid until after graph initialization has occurred (see FactorGraph.initialize()).

        Since:
        0.05

      • isDeterministicOutput

        public final boolean isDeterministicOutput()
        True if variable is an output from a directed deterministic function.

        This attribute is not valid until after graph initialization has occurred (see FactorGraph.initialize()).

        Since:
        0.05

      • remove

        public void remove(Factor factor)
        Remove all edges from this variable to the specified factor.

        NOTE: this does not remove the edge back from the factor to the variable!

        Throws:
        DimpleException - if variable is not connected to the factor.

      • split

        public Variable split(FactorGraph fg,
             Factor[] factorsToBeMovedToCopy)

      • createJointNoFactors

        @Internal
public Variable createJointNoFactors(Variable... variables)
        Creates a new variable that combines the domains of this variable with additional variables.

        For use by FactorGraph.join(Variable...). Currently only supported for Discrete variables.

        Parameters:
        variables - specifies at least one additional variables to join with this one. As a convenience, this may begin with this variable, in which case there must be at least one other variable.
        Category:
        internal

      • requireSolver

        @Internal
public ISolverVariable requireSolver(java.lang.String methodName)
        Returns solver variable or throws an exception if not yet set.

        For internal use only.

        Since:
        0.06
